1178.name: Dur 71
1178.Applications: For extreme wear resistance, elements as Niobium and Chromium carbides are also added to obtain a complex carbide structure. Specially used for applications subject to abrasive wear such as sand or other minerals with little impact. Recommended for the brick and clay industry or extreme high temperature applications in power plant industries.
1178.Suitable_For: For extreme heavy abrasion and wear applications such as, mixers and screws in the brick and clay industry, electricity powerplant srews (ash), mining, drilling etc
